coherence_artifact.answer:
﻿# Summary

This note demonstrates the UCC coherence_audit pipeline on a small artifact.

# Assumptions

Toy audit: metrics are proxies; not a truth guarantee.

# Limitations

This example uses a minimal claim list and local artifacts. It is not a peer-reviewed conclusion.

# Uncertainty

Results depend on the exact artifacts referenced and any perturbation variants provided.

# Disclosure

Research scaffold only. Report issues via GitHub.

# Result

Guided vs unguided comparisons can be represented as claim-to-source mappings and audited for traceability and drift.

claims.text: See answer body (scaffold claim; replace with precise claims).

items.description: Coherence metrics are proxies; not a truth guarantee.

exceptions.process: Document exception, assign acceptor, set expiry, review on cadence.

coherence_artifact.question: Demonstrate coherence_audit on a small writeup.
